name: df-reps
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(creps, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, cn0, cmpt(s2, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s1)), cv(s0))))
comment: Definition to construct a word consisting of one repeated symbol, often called "repeated symbol word" for short in the following. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Nov-2018.)
